nodes.text: A Sullustan executive once hired the mercenary group known as Aurodium Sword to protect him. While under the organization's care, the Sullustan came under fire from an industrial assassination squad. In the ensuing skirmish, the Sullustan was protected by team members including a ARC trooper known as Muzzle, the Wookiee bounty hunter Snoova, and another Wookiee. An Imperial intelligence agent attained an image of the conflict and included it in a report on the mercenary organization intended for the Galactic Empire. Imperial Commander Maximillian Seerdon of the Imperial Security Bureau included the report and image in his dossier on various underworld figures compiled in 0 ABY. Although pictured, the Sullustan went nameless in the document.
